PrecisOrder (a) consenting to the use by the PROVINCE OF BRITISH COLUMBIA of its statutory power to acquire a right-of-way on NIMPKISH INDIAN RESERVE No. 2, for highway and public utility purposes, and (b) granting them an easement for those purposes, in lieu thereof.
